{"id":809652432,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1664265308,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/809652432/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Arranging Coins","memory":"41.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int arrangeCoins(int n) {\n        long  start  = 1;\n        long  end = n;\n        long  ans = 0;\n         while (start <= end) {\n            long mid = start + (end - start) / 2;\n            // formula for finding sum of n natural numbers  sum = n*(n+1)/2\n            long filledCoins = mid * (mid + 1) / 2;\n            \n            if (filledCoins == n) {\n                return (int) mid;\n            }\n            if (filledCoins < n) {\n                start = mid + 1;\n            } else {\n                end = mid - 1;\n            }\n        }\n        return (int) end;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"arranging-coins","has_notes":false}
